# 8.2.0

## release on 20250727
## description
## changes
Android

Introducing options for super-rich bottom-tabs styling! - <a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3267017409" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url="https://github.com/wix/react-native-navigation/issues/8071" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/wix/react-native-navigation/pull/8071/hovercard" href="https://github.com/wix/react-native-navigation/pull/8071">#8071</a> by d4vidi (this is the same as <a href="https://github.com/wix/react-native-navigation/releases/tag/7.49.0">v7.49.0</a>)

* Enables the <code>translucent</code> option for a blurred background (previously iOS-only)
* Margin and content-wrap layout for a float-feel effect

Read more about it here: <a href="https://wix.github.io/react-native-navigation/docs/bottomTabs/#styling-the-tabs" rel="nofollow">https://wix.github.io/react-native-navigation/docs/bottomTabs/#styling-the-tabs</a>

<strong>Example:</strong>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/9818880/471209937-1c8925f5-d8b7-4706-83ad-0777949ab4da.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Cb57m3Hp3BCv91Sq67ht0hTa1j1oDK2sJI_mnEmZdqs"><img width="407" height="142" alt="image" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/9818880/471209937-1c8925f5-d8b7-4706-83ad-0777949ab4da.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Cb57m3Hp3BCv91Sq67ht0hTa1j1oDK2sJI_mnEmZdqs" content-type-secured-asset="image/png" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto; max-height: 142px;"></a>

(source):

    bottomTabs: {
      drawBehind: true,
      translucent: true,
      blurRadius: 2.2,
      layoutStyle: 'compact',
      bottomMargin: 20,
      cornerRadius: 20,
      elevation: 3,
      backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,239,114,0.7)',
    },
